About me

paragraaf over mij

Projects

inleiding

Tech-related

Because i've been wandering the tech-track of Communication and Multimedia Design, I've worked on lots of tech-related projects. Below are a few of those.

functional programming

Data cleaning exercises. Fetch a dataset of a questionnaire that the students filled in during the Information Design Datavisualization-course, and clean this data using filters based on functional programming principles. Project during the Tech Track of Information Design Project 2020.

photography on-the-go

An interactive multi-device prototype for photographers on the go. Travelling photographers can view, rate and annotate their pictures using their phone. Assignment for the second year's project 'Project Web' of CMD.

plog de dag

Responsive onepage design. Website for promoting the 'Plog de dag'-event in the style of IAMsterdam. Added interaction with subtle changes in transitions and with animations.

spotify lyrics

Lyrics design for Spotify. Title design for the song "I'm OK' by Little Big, based on visual research.

design patterns

Multi-Device Design use case analysis. Research of an existing Multi-Device design, presented in a screenflow.

datavisualization

Storytelling-based series of datavisualizations. Digital prototype, presented in a 'choose your story'-style, based on data from a survey.

photography collection nmvw

Client-side application using Vue 2. Dynamically renders data to views using JavaScript and a front-end framework. Includes reflection on the merits and costs of frameworks together.

zorgcowboys

'Zorgcowboys' team project for KRO-NCRV Pointer. Users can find their own healthcare institution or an institution of interest and can shop with the profit they made in a specific year. Users can buy silly things in the webshop like a private jet or an Aston Martin supercar.

Read more procesverslag productbiografie

twitter feuds

Real-time web app, using sockets. Compare the follower count of two rivaling twitter accounts over time, and see which one is winning in popularity. Inspired by the Tati/James feud.

cmd digital playground

PWA team project, data managed by a headless CMS. Allows non-tech-y textwriters, developers, students and other collaborators to contribute to this environment that contains (in-depth) information about Communication and Multimedia Design. Final assignment of the minor Web Development 2020.

Read more design rationale productbiografie

meditrack

Keep track of your medicine intake. For who constantly forgets if they have taken their medicine yet. Add doses, retrieve past doses and view your intake over the last few weeks. Specifically made to work on every browser and following Progressive Enhancement principles.

real-time chatbot

Interact with a quote-hoarding chatbot. Users can add quotes to a quotelist, then request a random one via the quote-command. Chatbot responds with quotes when specific words are used (kinda like Slackbot-responses)

exclusive design

Exclusive design for exhibiting a sound-fragment to Blind users. The website is specifically made for one person (Larissa), whom is visually impaired. There are a few funny additions that will appear on the screen reader she uses.

wafs participation

Fetch GitHub data in a client-side web app. Keep track of the current participants of the Web App From Scratch class in the minor Webdevelopment (2020).

weekly nerd

Blogposts and sketchnotes to digitally flip through. Click through my sketchnotes of interesting lectures as if you're flipping over the pages of a real book. Below, there's also a collection of articles that i've written.

Design

Illustrating is cool. I'm by no means a visual designer but I do really enjoy working on illustration/design skills.

Just a few

Photography

Passionate about pictures. Mostly of people. Digital or analog; both are cool.
